tags.name: Default
tags.description: Default endpoints that are included with Better Auth by default. These endpoints are not part of any plugin.

get.description: Get all chats for current user or organization

post.description: Create a new chat

get.description: Get a chat by id

200.description: Returns a stream of the response from the AI model

post.description: Send all messages of the chat to the AI model to get a response

403.description: Not allowed

post.description: Get a signed upload url for a given bucket and path

get.description: Get all purchases of the current user or the provided organization

post.description: Creates a checkout link for a one-time or subscription product
Creates a customer portal link for the customer or team. If a purchase is provided, the link will be created for the customer of the purchase.

post.summary: Send a message from the contact form
post.description: Send a message with an email and name

post.description: Takes an email and sends a confirmation email

get.description: Retrieve a specific trace by its ID

get.summary: Get changes between current_release and next_release
get.description: Returns a detailed diff showing items added, deleted, and modified between the current published version and the next unpublished version. Useful for reviewing changes before publishing.

post.summary: Publish the next dataset version and automatically increment version number
post.description: Publishes all items in the next_release version to current_release. Automatically increments the version number by 0.0.1 (patch increment). Items added after this will go into the new next_release version.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive information about a specific dataset version including existence status, item count, and version metadata. Returns status as 'published', 'unpublished', 'legacy', or 'nonexistent'.

get.summary: List dataset items for a specific version
get.description: Retrieves items from a specific version. Defaults to current_release if no version specified. Items marked as deleted (via deleted_at_version) are automatically filtered out for the requested version. Returns 404 if the specified version does not exist.

post.summary: Batch create dataset items in next_release version
post.description: Creates multiple dataset items that will be added to the dataset's next_release version. These items will become part of the published dataset when you call the publish endpoint.

itemIds.description: Array of item IDs to delete

delete.description: Marks items as deleted. If items exist only in unpublished versions, they are permanently removed. If items exist in published versions, they are soft-deleted and marked with deleted_at_version in the next_release.

Marks a single item as deleted. If the item exists only in unpublished versions, it is permanently removed. If it exists in published versions, it is soft-deleted and marked with deleted_at_version in the next_release.

401.description: Unauthorized

500.description: Internal server error

get.description: Retrieves scorer results with optional filtering by dataset, item, and scorer.

400.description: Bad request

401.description: Unauthorized

500.description: Internal server error

post.description: Creates a new scorer result for a dataset item.

401.description: Unauthorized

500.description: Internal server error

404.description: Scorer result not found

400.description: Bad request

401.description: Unauthorized

500.description: Internal server error

401.description: Unauthorized

404.description: Scorer result not found

500.description: Internal server error

200.description: Successfully retrieved scorers. Returns an array of all available scorers.

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication required

500.description: Internal server error

parameters.name: organizationSlug
parameters.description: The unique slug identifier for the organization. Used to filter organization-specific scorers.

get.description: Retrieves all available scorers for the organization. This includes both default (system-wide) scorers and organization-specific custom scorers. Scorers are evaluation functions used to assess the quality, performance, or other metrics of AI traces, spans, or datasets. Results are sorted alphabetically by name.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input data or schema validation failed

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication required

500.description: Internal server error

parameters.name: organizationSlug
parameters.description: The unique slug identifier for the organization

post.description: Creates a new scorer for the organization. Scorers are evaluation functions that can be applied to traces, spans, or datasets to measure quality, performance, or other metrics. By default, isDefault is set to false, making the scorer available only to the specified organization.

200.description: Successfully retrieved scorer with complete configuration details

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication required

404.description: Scorer not found with the specified ID

500.description: Internal server error

parameters.name: organizationSlug
parameters.description: The unique slug identifier for the organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the scorer to retrieve

get.summary: Get a single scorer by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific scorer by its unique identifier. Returns the complete scorer configuration including name, description, type, schemas, and metadata. This endpoint can be used to retrieve both default (system-wide) scorers and organization-specific scorers.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid input data or schema validation failed

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication required

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot modify default scorer or scorer from another organization

404.description: Scorer not found

500.description: Internal server error

parameters.name: organizationSlug
parameters.description: The unique slug identifier for the organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the scorer to update

requestBody.description: The scorer fields to update. Only provided fields will be modified.

put.description: Updates an existing scorer for the organization. Only organization-specific scorers can be modified - default scorers and scorers from other organizations cannot be updated. All fields in the request body are optional and only provided fields will be updated.

204.description: Successfully deleted scorer. No content returned in response body.

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication required

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot delete default scorer or scorer from another organization

404.description: Scorer not found with the specified ID

500.description: Internal server error

parameters.name: organizationSlug
parameters.description: The unique slug identifier for the organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the scorer to delete

delete.description: Permanently deletes a scorer from the organization. This operation cannot be undone. Only organization-specific scorers can be deleted - default (system-wide) scorers and scorers from other organizations cannot be removed. Returns 204 No Content on successful deletion.

404.description: Project not found
Project not found
Project not found

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource or to perform this action.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource was not found.

429.description: Too Many Requests. You have exceeded the rate limit. Try again later.

500.description: Internal Server Error. This is a problem with the server that you cannot fix.
